input_doc_title: FemiClear is a natural solution for BV, UTI, Yeast and Genital Herpes
input_doc_description: Providing over-the-counter symptom relief and protection from concerns like Bacterial Vaginosis (BV), Urinary Tract Infections (UTI), Yeast Infections, and Genital Herpes. FemiClear is made with all-natural and organic ingredients.

Trusted by board certified OBGYN's

        Explore Expert Perspectives on Your  Intimate Wellbeing
      




DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.
        









                    Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

        Explore Expert Perspectives on Your  Intimate Wellbeing
      




DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

Trusted by board certified OBGYN's

        Explore Expert Perspectives on Your  Intimate Wellbeing
      




DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.

					Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.
